contents.item: You know your strengths but you must know your weaknesses more.
contents.owner: Girdhar Joshi, Some Mistakes Have No Pardon

contents.item: We all get scared and want to turn away, but it isn’t always strength that makes you stay. Strength is also making the decision to change your destiny.
She had maintained her strength in the face of all this for so long that we had come to take it for granted, but she wasn't bulletproof. She might've been peculiar but she was also human,
Though I’m tempted by the call of the sea, I resist. It can’t claim me.In a way I’m stronger than the waves and I feel good about that.
The world was so much more forgiving of strength when it took on the appearance of weakness.
...strength is not the absence of vulnerability. Strength is knowing what your weaknesses are and working with them.
contents.owner: Terrence Real, How Can I Get Through to You? Closing the Intimacy Gap Between Men and Women

contents.item: Sooner  or  later  it  would  happen:  strength  would  change  into  consciousness.
Vulnerability has a strength of its own.
As one widow put it to me, “Strength doesn’t mean being able to stand up to anything, but being able to crawl on your belly a long, long time before you can stand up again.
contents.owner: Mark Matousek, When You're Falling, Dive: Lessons in the Art of Living

contents.item: She didn't struggle and soshe didn't grow
Out of your vulnerabilities will come your strength.
Even the strongest of opponents always has a weakness.-Itachi Uchiha

Always she thought of him as climbing some mountain in his mind, like that great one to the west on which his eyes would dwell so often and from which he seemed to derive something that was even more than strength.
contents.owner: Elizabeth Yates, Amos Fortune, Free Man

contents.item: If you are weak then it can be your strength
Your weakness is your strength
Sometimes it felt like no one was ever there for her. Everyone thought she was so strong. And she was, for the most part. But that didn’t mean she never needed anyone to lean on.

The strength I'm looking for isn't the type where you win or lose. I'm not after a wall that'll repel power coming from outside. What I want us the kind of strength to be able to absorb that kind of power, to stand up to it. The strength to quietly endure things - unfairness, misfortunes, sadness, mistakes, misunderstandings.
Writing can be a source of strength-Wang Liang
contents.owner: Xinran, Sky Burial: An Epic Love Story of Tibet

contents.item: He can transform the incapability in you to do what the capables, even together, cannot do.
Neither super strength, nor telepathy, nor flight, nor telekinesis, nor any aberrant ability will ever be as great as the innate ability that a woman has when she is able to control her own mind.
contents.owner: Kenn Bivins, the Wedding & Disaster of Felona Mabel
